quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
author: Mabel Newcomer

quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Leadership is not about being the best. It's about making everyone else better.
author: Anonymous

quote: A true leader doesn't create followers, they create more leaders.
author: Anonymous

quote: Leadership is not about being the boss, it's about showing the way.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Leadership is about influence, not authority.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Leadership is the ability to get extraordinary achievement from ordinary people.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people where to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
author: John Zenger

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads the people from within them.
author: Mabel Newcomer

author: Abraham Lincoln

author: Ronald Reagan

author: Steve Jobs

author: Bill Bradley

author: John C. Maxwell

quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people where to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Leadership is the art of giving people a platform for spreading ideas that work.
author: Seth Godin

quote: Great leaders are not defined by the absence of weakness, but rather by the presence of clear strengths.
author: John Zenger

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: The key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right–for you'll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don’t necessarily want to go, but ought to be.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: True leaders understand that leadership is not about them but about those they serve.
author: Anonymous

quote: The task of the leader is to get their people from where they are to where they have not been.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: The function of a leader is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: Great leaders are willing to sacrifice their own personal interests for the good of the team.
author: John Wooden

quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A great person attracts great people and knows how to hold them together.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Leadership is not about titles, positions, or flowcharts. It is about one life influencing another.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: Earn your leadership every day.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results, not attributes.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Leadership is not a position or title, it is action and example.
author: Cory Booker

quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Don’t find fault, find a remedy.
author: Henry Ford

quote: A leader’s job is not to do the work for others, it’s to help others figure out how to do it themselves, to get things done, and to succeed beyond what they thought possible.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: The only safe ship in a storm is leadership.
author: Faye Wattleton

quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
author: Tony Blair

quote: Average leaders raise the bar on themselves; good leaders raise the bar for others; great leaders inspire others to raise their own bar.
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.
author: Max DePree

quote: Lead me, follow me, or get out of my way.
author: George S. Patton

quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: He who has never learned to obey cannot be a good commander.
author: Aristotle

quote: The measure of leadership is not the quality of the head, but the tone of the body. The signs of a bad leader are fear and corruption.
author: Clarence Thomas

quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: To be a leader, you must be a bridge.
author: Welsh Proverb

quote: Integrity is the most valuable and respected quality of leadership. Always keep your word.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The goal of many leaders is to get people to think more highly of the leader. The goal of a great leader is to help people to think more highly of themselves.
author: Carla Harris

quote: Leadership is an opportunity to serve. It is not a trumpet call to self-importance.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: You don't need a title to be a leader.
author: Mark Sanborn

quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
author: Sam Walton

quote: A leader is someone who demonstrates what’s possible.
author: Mark Yarnell

quote: My responsibility is getting all my players playing for the name on the front of the jersey, not the one on the back.
author: Anonymous

quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
author: Max Lucado

quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Leaders think and talk about the solutions. Followers think and talk about the problems.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The best leaders are those most interested in surrounding themselves with assistants and associates smarter than they are.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: A ruler should be slow to punish and swift to reward.
author: Ovid

quote: Real leadership is leaders recognizing that they serve the people that they lead.
author: Pete Hoekstra

quote: A leader is a person you will follow to a place you wouldn't go by yourself.
author: Joel Barker

quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Great leaders start with 'why'.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: High-performance teams have a leader who is more like a coach than a boss.
author: Anonymous

quote: Leadership is a choice, not a rank.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
author: George S. Patton

quote: The most dangerous leadership myth is that leaders are born—that there is a genetic factor to leadership. That’s nonsense; in fact, the opposite is true. Leaders are made rather than born.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: The supreme quality of leadership is integrity.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Leadership is the ability to guide others without force into a direction or decision that leaves them still feeling empowered and accomplished.
author: Lisa Cash Hanson

quote: Whosoever desires to be a leader must also be a servant.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
author: Theodore M. Hesburgh

quote: Leadership consists of nothing but taking responsibility for everything that goes wrong and giving your subordinates credit for everything that goes well.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader.
author: Aristotle

quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
